articles.author: Rakesh Patil
articles.title: More than 150 smallcaps surge 10-68% in September - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The market is due for a short term upward pull back in the near term.  It has formed a long legged doji formation, which may see trending activity on either side, says Amol Athawale,  Vice President - Technical Research, Kotak Securities.
articles.content: The weak global cues including likely rate hikes, dollar strength, higher US bond yields, rising crude oil prices and FII selling, keep the domestic benchmark indices volatile in the last week of Sep… [+4446 chars]

articles.title: World Rabies Day: IIT Guwahati spreads awareness on viral zoonotic disease - ANI News
articles.description: The Indian Institute of Technology Guwahati (IIT Guwahati) observed World Rabies Day on September 28 with multiple activities and initiatives to spread awareness about this fatal, yet preventable disease.
